name: SWARM
description:
We're a digital studio that creates products people love to use, from mobile apps for iOS and Android, to AppleTV, Web Applications, and even complex technologies like Machine Learning / AI. 
We engage with clients through a rigorous consulting approach that distills your product to its core emotional elements, this lets us understand your user in a way that is unique. 
Great products don’t exist in a vacuum. This is why we like to engage with clients in each phase of product strategy, design and development. We listen closely and speak creativity and honestly, our processes are open, where you're involved in every step, and are part of our team. 
Great products also make a difference, and this is our goal. Our apps are often in the top 10, and almost exclusively in the top 100 of their respective categories, this is because we not only build technology, but understand the business around it. We look at market, opportunity, and marketability when working with you to make product decisions. 
So if you're looking to build a business, reach millions of users, or develop a new technology, please reach out.
